body.name: Hermitlux Induction Cooktop, 1800W Fast Heating Portable Hot Plate, 9 Power Levels Induction Burner with Easy Clean Glass, Sensor Touch & Child Lock
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 51 mins
features: 【PORTABLE STOVE】This Hermitlux induction cooktop is designed to be portable and easy to handle. It operates on a standard 110/120V 15 amp electrical outlet. Additionally, it is ETL listed and built to North American electrical standards. This hot plate is a great addition to any kitchen and is compact enough for convenient storage.

【HEATS UP QUICKLY】Hermitlux portable induction cooktop is more efficient than traditional gas stoves. With the "MAX" button, the electric stove quickly rises to maximum power and will boil 1.5 liters of water in 6 minutes.
【EASY TO USE】Hermitlux induction burner has an LED touch panel for responsive operation. Effortless power setting replaces complicated functions, which is easy to use and understand.

【MULTI-FUNCTIONAL】The electric burner provides 9 power levels to meet your different cooking needs, and the 180 mins timer setting is convenient for food that needs to be cooked for a long time, saving your time and making cooking easier.

【SAFETY FEATURE】Consider safety in mind; these electric stove burners with a child lock, residual heat reminder, and stop & go function. High-quality heat-resistant plastic keeps it from producing unpleasant smells when cooking.
【EASY TO CLEAN】The premium glass surface is elegant and easy to clean. Smooth texture with no annoying dents to hide dirt. Just wipe it to make it sparkling clean.

【WHAT YOU GET】Hermitlux single burner induction stove, user manual; as a responsible seller, if you have any problem with the Hemitlux induction cooktop, please get in touch with our customer service at any time, and we will give you a satisfying reply within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RESIDUAL HEAT REMINDER The residual heat reminder function monitors the unseen temperatures. Remind you to stay away from injury when the temperature is higher than 140°F. STOP & GO Thanks to the intelligent memory stop & go technology, you can pause cooking at any time to deal with emergencies, and restart without resetting. EFFICIENT HEAT DISSIPATION Equipped with a powerful fan to rapidly dissipate heat, ensure a longer lifetime of the countertop burner.

PRECISION & IMMEDIACY CONTROL With a high-quality touch control panel, this induction cooker is easy to operate and responsive. CHILD LOCK Consider the safety of your family and children in mind, hermitlux induction burner is equipped with a child lock, which can easily lock the panel to prevent children from misoperation. 180-MINUTE TIMER Timing for up to 180 minutes helps you cook more efficiently. Just set the timer and you can leave to do other things. It will turn off automatically when the time is up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good burner
reviews.reviewText: This burner is powerful and safe. It heats up very fast and has 9 levels of heat. Perfect for Korean BBQ and hot pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heats up Fast
reviews.reviewText: I like cooking on this but there was a learning curve. It gets hot 🥵 like really hot. I have to watch it and not leave the kitchen. I turned my back with first use and almost ruined my Le Creuset. Be careful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cook top
reviews.reviewText: This thing is the best cooktop I have ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Almost no noise and can cook just like a stove top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for camping, etc.
reviews.reviewText: We camp and HAD been using one small old fashioned electric coil burner. It got the job done, but it took forever to boil water for tea/coffee/instant oatmeal or to make water warm enough to wash dishes.NO LONGER! This induction burner is big, stable, and heats twice as much water in less than half the time. My husband absolutely loves it! Yes, at high heat levels, it makes a little noise, but it’s not bad at all. Except for boiling water, we never use it above level 5. Pans are much more stable, too, because it’s a much larger base.We bought a used teakettle that was magnetic, and our travel skillet already was. We’re not ready to buy a full induction cookware set, but may buy a 3 qt lidded deep skillet. We will still use the old coil burner if we need to heat two dishes separately, but we definitely prefer the induction burner.I’d be on the lookout for sale prices on Black Friday and Cyber Monday (word to the wise). Btw, the seller is very responsive to messages and has very good English proficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 📢 Noisy little thing
reviews.reviewText: The good: Does the job, heats pretty fast, easy to clean.The bad: loud fan noise, loud beeping when removing pot from surface. Heating area a bit small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great appliance at a fair price
reviews.reviewText: I had been eying induction burners for some time now. My stovetop burners are finicky and I finally got fed up with having pots boil over or not otherwise stay at the temperature I wanted. This burner is actually somewhat larger than I expected, but that’s a good thing because it easily accommodates my Lodge Dutch Oven and 12” cast iron frying pan. The performance is outstanding. At the high setting a covered pot of water starts to boil in less than a minute. After that I can turn it down to one of the lower settings and it will stay at the exact same temperature indefinitely. It’s also very easy to clean. Great product!
